alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 6:27AM AKST until December 31 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Port Alexander. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 4 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected Friday mid morning into early afternoon. The Sitka area will change to rain earlier, but the hillside can expect 1 to 3 inches of snowfall accumulation.
info.instruction: An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent. Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
